item.title: Ring of Stone + ::pnpc doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @pies pies
item.description:
@pies wrote:

The title is self-explanitary but here is the problem;

When someone wields a ring of stone on my server, they turn into a stone for about 1 second and then change back.

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) { int targetSlot = 0; if((playerItems[slot] - 1) == wearID) { if(wearID == 6583) { npcId = 2626; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

That is the script (I got that of another source I previously used and it works fine.)

[u]::pnpc[/u]

The same happens with ::pnpc (number). I type in the NPC ID and it changes to the NPC for about 1 secons and then changes back.

if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 3) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } }

That is the PNPC script. I also got that of a source I used to use on my server but it doesn’t work on my new one.

Any help on fixing this would be great, thanks.

Need more info? Just ask.

Read full topic
